features.name: Authentication & Authorization
features.description: Email/social auth via NextAuth with Supabase session; route protection via middleware and server components.

features.name: QR Code Generation (Basic)
features.description: Generate static QR codes with customization (color, size, logo, format).

features.name: QR Code Generation (Advanced)
features.description: Advanced options including gradients, shapes, frames, and watermark overlay.

features.name: Dynamic QR Codes
features.description: Short links mapped to target URLs with ability to update destination and enforce expiration/scan limits.

features.name: Scan Tracking & Analytics
features.description: Tracks scans with user agent, IP, and timestamps for analytics.

features.name: Dashboard & Management
features.description: Authenticated dashboard to manage QR codes, view analytics, and perform CRUD operations.

features.name: File Uploads (Logos/Images)
features.description: Validates and uploads logo files to Supabase Storage for embedding into QR codes.

features.name: Payments & Credits (Razorpay)
features.description: Handles purchasing credits/subscriptions with Razorpay and tracks payments.

features.name: Pricing & Plans
features.description: Public pricing page and related UI components.

features.name: Middleware & Routing
features.description: Protects routes and sets headers; manages dynamic short link routing.

features.name: Supabase Client & Server Utilities
features.description: Centralized Supabase client and shared utilities for server/client usage.

features.name: API Routes (RESTful endpoints)
features.description: Next.js API routes for CRUD on QR codes, links, uploads, payments, and analytics.
